comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request met all of the guidelines for auto-merging and is scheduled to be merged when the mandatory waiting period (3 days) has elapsed.

If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.

<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->
Purposefully blocked for now as suggested by @yebai

@sharanry @yebai Would you like me to merge this PR? Or do you want me to close it?

[noblock]

FWIW I think the package name is good.

[noblock]

@DilumAluthge Thanks for the help. We are in the process of deciding whether this additional package can be included as part of an existing package. Please feel free to close this PR. We'll open a new PR if necessary later.

> @DilumAluthge Thanks for the help. We are in the process of deciding whether this additional package can be included as part of an existing package. Please feel free to close this PR. We'll open a new PR if necessary later.

Sounds good. I'll close this PR. Let me know if you need any additional help in the future!
